dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach the Void Haunter, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your purpose.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is beyond your feeble grasp. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to challenge you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenges amuse me. What do you have to offer?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer knowledge in exchange for safe passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic mortal, knowledge is meaningless. Prepare for your demise!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer servitude and assistance in your endeavors.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Servitude? Interesting. Prove your loyalty, and we may talk further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power greater than my own.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power you seek, yet lack the strength to wield. Leave before you tempt fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for disturbing you. I will leave at once.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies acknowledged. Depart, and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you for a test of strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you will regret your decision!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking harmony between our kinds.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Harmony? Such notions are foreign to me. Speak your purpose before I grow bored.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a truce to coexist without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? The idea is amusing, but impossible. Leave before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your hostility with kindness and understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Kindness is weakness, and understanding is futile. This conversation is over.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not fear you, creature of shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear is wise in the presence of the Void Haunter. Choose your words carefully.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in a battle with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interest matters little. Action speaks louder than words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. The shadows will watch your departure.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you seek conflict, then come and face me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fool. Prepare for the consequences!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your shadows hold no sway over me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hubris will be your downfall. Beware, insolent one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand my ground against your threats.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Standing alone against the shadows? A futile endeavor.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no reason to continue this conversation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The Void Haunter cares not for your reasons. Leave, insignificant being.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness is nothing compared to the light within me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light within you? Delusional mortal, your light will fade in the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not engage in a battle of words with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words or blades, the outcome is the same. Choose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It seems our paths lead in different directions. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell indeed. May the shadows consume you on your way.
